qas.question: What is the aggregate population of Paris?
From what census is this information from?
What is the population of Paris' metropolitan area?
How many kilometers does the administrative region cover?
As of 2014 how many inhabitants lived in the administrative region?

context: Since the 19th century, the built-up area of Paris has grown far beyond its administrative borders; together with its suburbs, the whole agglomeration has a population of <a0_0>10,550,350<a0_0/> (Jan. <a1_0>2012 census<a1_0/>). Paris' metropolitan area spans most of the Paris region and has a population of <a2_0>12,341,418<a2_0/> (Jan. 2012 census), or one-fifth of the population of France. The administrative region covers <a3_0>12,012 km²<a3_0/> (4,638 mi²), with approximately <a4_0>12 million<a4_0/> inhabitants as of 2014, and has its own regional council and president.
